name: Chicken Biryani
description: Aromatic basmati rice cooked with tender chicken pieces, infused with exotic spices and saffron. Served with raita and gravy.

name: Mutton Biryani
description: Premium mutton pieces slow-cooked with fragrant basmati rice, herbs and traditional Hyderabadi spices. A royal treat!

name: Veg Biryani
description: Colorful mix of fresh vegetables layered with aromatic basmati rice and special biryani masala. Perfect vegetarian delight!

name: Margherita Pizza
description: Classic Italian pizza with fresh mozzarella, ripe tomatoes, basil leaves and olive oil on hand-tossed dough.

name: Pepperoni Pizza
description: Loaded with premium pepperoni slices, extra cheese and Italian herbs on crispy thin crust. A meat lover's favorite!

name: Farmhouse Pizza
description: Generous topping of fresh veggies - bell peppers, onions, tomatoes, mushrooms with gooey cheese on crispy base.

name: Classic Veg Burger
description: Crispy vegetable patty with fresh lettuce, tomatoes, onions and special mayo sauce in soft sesame bun.

name: Chicken Cheese Burger
description: Juicy grilled chicken patty topped with melted cheese, crispy lettuce and tangy sauce. Pure indulgence!

name: Double Patty Burger
description: Two flame-grilled beef patties stacked with double cheese, pickles and our signature sauce. Maximum satisfaction!

name: Masala Dosa
description: Crispy rice crepe filled with spiced potato masala, served with coconut chutney and sambar. South Indian classic!

name: Idli Sambar
description: Soft steamed rice cakes (4 pieces) served with piping hot sambar and fresh coconut chutney. Healthy breakfast choice!

name: Vada Sambar
description: Crispy lentil donuts (3 pieces) dunked in flavorful sambar, served with chutneys. Perfect tea-time snack!

name: Butter Chicken
description: Tender chicken pieces in creamy tomato-based gravy with butter and aromatic spices. Best enjoyed with naan!

name: Paneer Butter Masala
description: Soft cottage cheese cubes in rich, creamy tomato gravy with butter and cashew paste. Vegetarian favorite!

name: Dal Tadka
description: Yellow lentils tempered with garlic, cumin, and ghee. Comfort food served with jeera rice or roti.

name: White Sauce Pasta
description: Penne pasta tossed in creamy white sauce with herbs, vegetables and parmesan cheese. Italian comfort!

name: Red Sauce Pasta
description: Al dente pasta in tangy tomato basil sauce with Italian herbs and olive oil. Classic and delicious!

name: Chicken Alfredo Pasta
description: Fettuccine pasta with grilled chicken in rich Alfredo sauce made with cream, butter and parmesan. Creamy perfection!

name: French Fries
description: Crispy golden potato fries seasoned with salt and herbs. Perfect side or snack with ketchup!

name: Chicken Nuggets
description: Crispy breaded chicken bites (8 pieces) served with honey mustard and BBQ sauce. Kids' favorite!

name: Veg Spring Rolls
description: Crispy rolls stuffed with fresh vegetables and glass noodles. Served with sweet chili sauce (6 pieces).

name: Chocolate Brownie
description: Rich, fudgy chocolate brownie with chocolate chips, served warm with vanilla ice cream scoop. Pure decadence!

name: Vanilla Ice Cream
description: Creamy vanilla ice cream made with real vanilla beans. Classic dessert that never disappoints (2 scoops).

name: Gulab Jamun
description: Soft milk-solid dumplings soaked in rose-cardamom sugar syrup. Traditional Indian sweet (3 pieces).

name: Cold Coffee
description: Refreshing iced coffee blended with milk, sugar and ice cream. Perfect pick-me-up drink!
